full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS SMAN GYI RGYAL PO LA GDUNG 'BOD GSOL 'DEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,ZHES BCOM LDAN 'DAS SMAN GYI RGYAL PO LA GDUNG 'BOD GSOL 'DEBS 'DI 'DRA ZHIG DGOS ZHES, BYA BTANG RI KHROD 'DZIN PA CHEN PO AA LAG MKHAS GRUB RGYA MTSOS BSKUL NGOR, ^GSER TOG SKYES MING SNGAGS 'CHANG RGAN PO BLO BZANG TSUL @005B KHRIMS RGYA MTSOS KA RING DGON PAR SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O,, ,,TSUL 'DI KHAL KHA SE CHEN RGYAL KHAG GI ,BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG CHEN PO T'A CANG JUN, ,SE CHEN P'E LI TSE RING BSAM GRUB DANG, ,GA-YUNG DRUNG RDO RJE YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO BCAS, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE DPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I DGES, ,SKYE BA'I PHRENG BAR DAL 'BYOR RTEN BZANG THOB, ,DRIN CAN BLA MA MCHOG DANG MI 'GRAL ZHING, ,SA LAM YON TAN YONGS SU MTHAR PHYIN SHOG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,
author_simple: BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO,
